explanations.reason: The paper focuses on comparing the performance of Islamic, ethical, and conventional mutual funds using statistical methods such as paired t-statistics, one-way Bonferroni test, ANOVA, chi-squared test, and regression models. There is no mention or use of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other advanced computational methods listed in the keywords. The study is purely based on traditional statistical analysis and does not involve any of the specified machine learning or deep learning approaches.
